note.note-paragraph: In these subgroups, the following terms are used with the meaning indicated: - "piercing element" means skin penetrating component e.g. blade, needle, lancet, laser beam; - "piercing or lancing device" means device ready to be used for lancing; - "driving device" means device for driving a piercing element e.g. spring
This group and its subgroups are not complete pending a reorganisation. See also A61B5/14 , A61B5/1405 and subgroups
